item.title: This Nifty 'Notes' App Is Available to Install as a Snap Package - OMG! Ubuntu!
item.description:
This Nifty 'Notes' App Is Available to Install as a Snap Package - OMG! Ubuntu!

Remember that nifty OS X inspired Notes app we wrote about a few months back? Whether you do or you don't, if you're running Ubuntu 16.04 LTS it's now super easy to install. Notes is now available as a Snap, the new Ubuntu package format installed by default in the latest long-term support release.

item.title: PBS Digital Studios Asks 'Should Everything Be Open Source?' | FOSS Force
item.description:
PBS Digital Studios Asks 'Should Everything Be Open Source?' | FOSS Force

Trending Articles on FOSS Force The DMCA doesn't just make it illegal for you to circumvent DRM to rip and burn a DVD of 'War Games' or to install a pirated copy of Windows. It also can make it illegal for you to repair or modify things you own.

item.title: Qualcomm patches widespread vulnerability, but most phones will remain at risk
item.description:
Qualcomm patches widespread vulnerability, but most phones will remain at risk

Qualcomm has patched a vulnerability in netd (network_manager), which for the last five years has left devices vulnerable to having their text message and contact databases compromised. Qualcomm sent OEMs a fix for this problem back in March, but the gap in Android versions on the market means that most users are going to be out of luck.

item.title: Ubuntu Plans To Make Scopes Even Better - Here's How - OMG! Ubuntu!
item.description:
Ubuntu Plans To Make Scopes Even Better - Here's How - OMG! Ubuntu!

More details about the 'design evolution of Ubuntu Scopes' was shared by the Canonical design and engineering teams at the Ubuntu Online Summit. Why the need for a change? The usual mix of user-testing, developer feedback, design review.

item.title: Viber for Linux Update Adds End-to-End Encryption of Chats
item.description:
Viber for Linux Update Adds End-to-End Encryption of Chats

The Viber desktop Linux app has been updated, gaining a new look and new security measures. Your opinion the latest Beyonce album is now secure from prying eyes Part Skype, part WhatsApp, Viber combines traditional VoIP features with encrypted messaging, emoji and stickers.

item.title: Want a good tech job? Report says ​open-source skills are hotter than ever | ZDNet
item.description:
Want a good tech job? Report says ​open-source skills are hotter than ever | ZDNet

65 percent of HR managers say open-source hiring will increase more than any other part of their business over the next six months.

item.title: Ubuntu 16.10 Developer Summit Videos To Watch This Weekend - Phoronix
item.description:
Ubuntu 16.10 Developer Summit Videos To Watch This Weekend - Phoronix

This week was the Ubuntu Online Summit for planning about Ubuntu 16.10. Here are some videos for your enjoyment this weekend if you didn't get a chance to watch them live.

item.title: Skylake Pico-ITX SBC has optional I/O boards
item.description:
Skylake Pico-ITX SBC has optional I/O boards

Apr 27, 2016 - by Eric Brown - 0 views Axiomtek's 6th Gen Core "PICO500" Pico-ITX SBC offers extended temperature support, a mini-PCIe slot, and expansion ports with optional I/O cards.

item.title: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS video review
item.description:
Ubuntu 16.04 LTS video review

Ubuntu 16.04 LTS was recently released, and many Linux users have been wondering what it has to offer and if it's worth installing or upgrading from a previous release of Ubuntu. Not to worry, a YouTuber by the name of Quidsup has a full video review of Ubuntu 16.04 that will walk you through the latest changes to Canonical's popular desktop distribution.

item.title: How to maintain a "clean" Ubuntu
item.description:
How to maintain a "clean" Ubuntu

Ubuntu is the most popular GNU/Linux distribution, as it has been the easiest to use for many years now, making it an obvious choice for every newcomer. As most new users don't know if and how they are supposed to maintain they distribution, and since Ubuntu doesn't offer any tools for this job by default, I will provide an overview on the matter through this quick guide.
